petrinets.view

Class PNGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AbstractElement
      • org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AbstractGraph
        • org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AdjacencyListGraph

            • petrinets.view.PNGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<org.graphstream.graph.Node>, java.util.Observer, org.graphstream.graph.Element, org.graphstream.graph.Graph, org.graphstream.graph.Structure, org.graphstream.stream.AttributeSink, org.graphstream.stream.ElementSink, org.graphstream.stream.Pipe, org.graphstream.stream.Replayable, org.graphstream.stream.Sink, org.graphstream.stream.Source

    public class PNGraph
extends org.graphstream.graph.implementations.MultiGraph
implements java.util.Observer
    Die Klasse PNGraph repräsentiert die Visualisierung des Petrinetzes mittels der GraphStream-Bibliothek. Als Observer holt sie sich ihre Daten direkt aus dem Petrinetz
